idea: FIATS (FRANCO INDIA AGRO TECH & SERVICES PVT LTD.) an INDO-FRENCH collaboration promoted as 50:50 joint venture between Indian and French partners with a focus to bring FRENCH technology & services to India to cater to the growing needs of Indian Growers & Farmers in Agriculture & Horticulture sector. Fiats provide business solutions for Horticulture Specialty Fertilizers, Micro Nutrients, Fresh Fruit Grading Line, Horticulture Hand Tools, Nursery Fruit Plantation, Cold Chain Supply Solutions for seeds, fresh fruits and vegetables, Export of Indian Spices, Fresh / Dry Fruits & Dry Mushrooms, Import / Indenting of Fresh Fruits from Europe.
name: Franco India Agro Tech & Services Pvt. Ltd.

idea:
Dreamplug Technologies Private Limited operates through its brand name "CRED" which is a "members only" credit card bill payment platform that rewards its members for clearing that credit card bills on time and the members get exclusive rewards from premier brands upon clearing the credit card bills on time at the using the CRED application. Dreamplug is a technology driven company that uses its proprietary application to give a unique and seamless experience to its users by providing a platform to centralize their credit card bill payments and also enjoy rewards at the same time. CRED gives timely reminders to the members for making payments so as to avoid them landing up paying penalties and also offers the features of making payments on their behalf.

CRED is a start up with an unique idea and promising road map to drive the fintech wave in India and the recognition as a start up would go a long way in helping the Company with better administration and availing the conducive features made available by the Indian Government.
name: Dreamplug Technologies Private Limited

idea:
AAJ Media is a new generation start-up that is focussing on creating content for corporates, MSME and the entertainment industry and bring the fusion of Hollywood and Bollywood through a proprietary methodology called the HollyBolly way. Awarded as Indianâ€™s best Digital start-up, AAJ Media has forayed in several activities in Film making and has already received over 2 dozen awards and more than 25 paid customers in India and abroad.

The initial Capital investment was about 50 Lakhs and the promoters believe that this space of content creation and distribution, especially for carrying the unique stories and brand promise of MSME will see tremendous growth.
